alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Jasper; Simpson; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 07 at 11:56AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FOR MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of central and east central Mississippi, including the following counties, in central Mississippi, Simpson and Smith. In east central Mississippi, Clarke and Jasper. * WHEN...Monday night. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Three to six inches of rain with locally higher amounts may fall in a short period of time as thunderstorms move repeatedly across the area Monday night. This would likely lead to flash flooding.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued. Avoid flooded roadways, and always remember to turn around, don`t drown.
